vote.title: Reappointment of Trent Smith, Executive Director, Franklinton Board of Trade, 1091 West Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio  43222, to serve on the Scioto Peninsula New Community Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a new term expiration date of September 16, 2027, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (resume attached).
vote.description:
Title
 
Reappointment of Trent Smith, Executive Director, Franklinton Board of Trade, 1091 West Broad Street, Columbus, Ohio  43222, to serve on the Scioto Peninsula New Community Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a new term expiration date of September 16, 2027, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (resume attached).
